statements: UPDATE influencer_tracking SET user_interactions = 100 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE influencer_tracking SET conversions = 5, user_interactions = 150 WHERE post_id = 10;
UPDATE influencer_tracking SET user_interactions = user_interactions + 1, conversions = conversions + 2 WHERE influencer_id = 100 AND post_id = 200;
UPDATE influencer_tracking SET conversions = 5 WHERE post_id = 300 AND influencer_id = 150;
UPDATE influencers SET followers = 1000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like', interaction_timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE influencers SET followers = 10000, category = 'Fashion' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like', interaction_timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00' WHERE interaction_id = 2;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = 10000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE Posts SET likes_count = 500, comments_count = 100 WHERE post_id = 10;
UPDATE Influencers SET followers_count = followers_count + 100 WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Posts SET comments_count = comments_count + 1, likes_count = likes_count - 3 WHERE post_id = 12345;
UPDATE influencer SET influencer_name = 'Updated Influencer Name' WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE post SET post_likes = post_likes + 1, post_comments = 10 WHERE post_id = 100;
